transcript_chunks.text: gary widow um are you excited for skate four i couldn't give a flying about skate four i don't like skateboarding games snowbike mike how are you greg miller thank you so much for having me on of course i am a skate mega fan gary wida i have half of my face shaved right now i have shaving cream on half of my face because i had to come bring that on the camera oh my god okay gary what this is kidding no bike mic i gotta bring the hype about skate gary skate bear did a great job it's not freedom it's about creativity it's about you shredding the gnar and bringing your personal style out to the skater world and skate is the game that every gamer wants and i'm so happy that ea is finally falling out of that dumb creative hole that they've been sitting in and bringing us back the likes of ncaa football most importantly skateboard and if this is to be true greg miller we're in third street because skate four is everything that we're gonna want and more
